What is a queue?

Why should I care about queues?

Scalability

Vertical vs Horizontal

The Work Queue Pattern

  • Work items may not be lost.
  • Work must not be interrupted.
  • Work items are independent of one-another.
  • Work items may not be repeated.

Common Use Cases

  • Decoupling heavy-weight processing from a live user request.
  • Sending emails triggered by user actions
  • Dividing work among multiple worker nodes

Bad Practice

  • Using a database as queue

Providers

  • RabbitMq
  • Amazon SQS
  • IronMq

Similar Patterns

  • Load distribution
  • Relaxing of data constraints
